features: ✅ INSTANT CONNECTIVITY. Plug in the USB receiver and you can use the KLIM Chroma wireless keyboard instantly, from up to 30 feet away. There is no need to install any drivers!

✅ LONG-LASTING BATTERY. There's no need to buy batteries anymore! The gaming keyboard comes with high-quality built in rechargeable batteries. You will spend lesser money while helping the environment. It's simply a smart investment.
✅ STUNNING RAINBOW BACKLIGHTING. Bring your desk to life! Choose static or breathing mode, or turn off the lights completely if you prefer. Note: colors are not customizable.

✅ IMPROVE YOUR TYPING SPEED. The membrane keys have a short travel distance, allowing for quick and easy typing. Thanks to a new generation wireless transmitter, it performs as well as a wired keyboard.

✅ UNBEATABLE DURABILITY + 5-YEAR WARRANTY. The frame is made with highly-resistant ABS plastic and the keycaps have a unique coating that will keep the PC gaming keyboard in good condition for many years. We provide 24/7 support and a reliable 5-year warranty!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ULTRA DURABLE Made with ABS, a particularly resistant thermoplastic, the KLIM Chroma Wireless is a very robust keyboard! INTENSE BACKLIGHTING The KLIM Chroma Wireless is equipped with tri-coloured backlighting in three distinct zones. It is perfect in the dark, with each key glowing intensely so you can see them clearly. ACCURATE AND SILENT TYPING Equipped with an internal noise reduction system, its typing is truly silent. Extremely comfortable, this keyboard offers very precise keystrokes, ideal for work or gaming.
Features Wireless Membrane Backlight 17 oz / 480 g Weight 16 oz / 460 g Wireless Membrane Backlight 17 oz / 480 g Weight 26 oz / 740 g Wireless Membrane Backlight 17 oz / 480 g Weight 19 oz / 560 g

How long does the battery last? 8 hours at full brightness, 48 hours with brightness off. Is it compatible with PlayStation? Yes, the keyboard works with PS4 and PS5. Is it compatible with Xbox? Yes, the keyboard works with Xbox 360, Xbox One and Xbox S, provided the games support keyboard input (please check your console/software for additional information regarding compatibility).

Dimensions 17.3 x 5.7 x 0.8 in / 44.1 x 14.5 x 2.1 cm Weight 17 oz / 480 g Battery capacity 1300 mAh Charging time 4 hours Response time 8 ms Keyboard type Membrane Backlight modes Breathing, static illumination, off Connection method Wireless 2.4Ghz USB receiver

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great as a back-up or tester, not as a daily driver.
reviews.reviewText: okay. pros and cons.-pros- dongle is magnetized to keyboard and fits snug. i thought it was gonna fall off a few times but despite the dirt and rough n tough ive already put it through, i have yet to lose it.- usb-c. this is great. i love usb-c. in case you lose said dongle, you can always get a usb-c to usb-a cable on the cheap and have it wired. you can also charge it this way as well.- feel. it IS plastic. it is somewhat quiet. im not typing on it on the daily but hey, if youre not SUPER picky and its on sale, this is somewhat of a steal. I think I got it for, like, 30 bucks. I use it on a mini-pc and my nvidia shield and my laptop when I dont want to use its keyboard. does the job.cons- lights. you can turn these off by clicking fn and the pause break button. its in the manual that comes with it as well but I know its not the easiest to find out initially.- feel. it feels cheap. I know I just said its okay, but it does feel like it'll break under you when its got those little plastic feet out. keep it flat, that'll make it feel more sturdy.would I use this as a gaming keyboard? no. theres so many other keyboards out there that're not only cheaper but have better response. im not saying this keyboard doesnt have a latency, but you can do better. I have a wired klim that I use for my second computer, but its an older klim made out of metal and def has more quality put into it. this has some of that klim quality, but not as well as some of their other products. but hey, cheap & works & comes fast? I cant complain too much. great little back up/tester. wouldn't use this on the daily.oh, this thing also catches dust and dirt like no ones buisness. wash your hands before you use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels a little cheap but really good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Testing out the keyboard to see how responsive it is. It's not bad at all. Feels a little cheap when typing, but not bad. Keys are a little soft on impact but not bad. It's very quiet except for the spacebar, which is super loud. I don't see any lag at all with it. The instructions it comes with are so sparse as to be almost totally useless, but it's very plug-and-play, so that's really fine. I'm still not sure how to change the RGB settings on it, though. I also was very pleasantly surprised to find that it's USB-C rechargeable. So far, I've only been using it for a few minutes, so I can't say for sure, but I really like it. For the crazy low price, I'm very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Silent Keys, Times Backlight
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like the size and color of this keyboard. It does come with a few flaws. I am used to my other keyboard being plugged in, so the keys stay backlit until I turn them off. This one turns off after about 30 seconds, which is not great for me, since I work in a dimly lot or dark room most of the time. It does save battery, though. I haven't had to recharged it since I got it, so about a month. Granted, I haven't used it all that often so far. There is some control over the brightness of lights and fade, but it doesn't have that much versatility, especially for someone who like customizing things.I found that the Shift key on the left does not work with Ctrl. If you want to use "Shift +Ctrl" you have to use the left Shift key. It is quite inconvenient. I also keep missing the Enter key because I'm used to it being a bit bigger, but that's probably a me problem. They keys are smooth and way more silent than I am used to, which is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a fun keyboard!
reviews.reviewText: When I turned it on and the back lights appeared in a beautiful rainbow pattern, I was blown away. It is such a nice keyboard. I am definitely impressed with this product upon first receipt.What I love best about the product is everything, really. The keys are soft and comfortable. With the exception of the space key, I love how quiet these keys are. I can type discreetly without being too loud. I love that the lighting is adjustable (both in pattern and brightness). The "breathing" mode is a very neat feature and I like that I can adjust the speed of it. It has a calming effect! But I also like that I can keep the lights on all the time or even turn them off completely if I don't want them on. The wireless feature is neat because I can take it anywhere and position it anywhere and don't have to worry about plugging it in. I like the little legs on the bottom so I can raise the keyboard up or leave it flat if I want it to be more (or less) ergonomic. The battery display is a great feature because I can tell when I need to plug it in before it loses power. I also like that the dongle that plugs into the computer has a little nook on the back of the keyboard so they can stay together when not in use.On the instructions pamphlet, at the very end, it says "Thinks for Reading." It should say "Thanks for Reading." It's obvious that great care was taken to create a high-quality product, so it's disappointing to see such a careless error.One other thing I don't care for is how loud the space bar is. All the rest of the keys are soft and hardly make a sound, but when I tap the space bar, it makes a loud plastic-y sound that seems to resonate throughout the room. For how often it gets used, I was hoping it would be a bit quieter. Other than those two things, I wouldn't change anything!This product is very easy to use. The instructions were incredibly helpful and well written. It's nice to see the instructions written out in so many languages. It gives the impression that this is a worldwide company and because of that, very successful. It gives the company a lot of credibility. The instructions were easy to read and follow. I like that the "function" keys are explained and there is even an illustration of the keyboard with keys labelled so they are easy to find on the real keyboard.I absolutely love this keyboard and I would recommend it to all of my friends. Whether you have a laptop or a desktop computer, this keyboard is not only great to look at, it works very well. There is an incredible value for the money here. I have several KLIM products in my office and I love each one. I am satisfied with this company and will definitely purchase products from them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LIGHT UP WIRELESS KEYBOARD
reviews.reviewText: THIS IN PINK AND IT IT IS PERFECT IN EVERYWAY. WHEN I USE IT AT NIGHT IT LITES UP AND I CAN SEE IT REAL WELL. I CAN PUT IT ANYWERE AND I DON;T HAVE CORDS IN THE WAY. I CAB SHUT OFF THE LIGHTS DURING THE DAY AND IT BECOMES PERFECT I CAN SRR ALL THE KEYS,WELL.L I'M 73 , MY FINGERS ARE A BIT STIFFER. I HAVE TO WATCH THEM A LITTLE MORE. SO EVEN THO IT IS NOT STANDARD BLACK TNE BACK LITES WORK WELL DAY AND NIGHT.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great value, excellent warranty and customer service
reviews.reviewText: I originally ordered this keyboard just over 2 years ago and was (and still am) very happy with the product. The product is lightweight, the keys feel nice and they are pretty quiet. I like that it has the separate number pad but the whole keyboard is not too large or bulky. The (rechargeable) battery lasted longer than I expected so I was able to take advantage of the wireless feature. When the battery does die, you can still use the keyboard while it is plugged in and charging, and the battery light on the top right corner turns off when its charged. The rainbow colour lights behind the keys are a nice touch, too! I am not a gamer though, so I have no comment on its features for that purpose.Just recently the battery started to die more frequently and I had to plug it in more often, which was not the end of the world for me, as most keyboards require cords anyway. However, the battery eventually started to expand and the keyboard warped and became unusable. I went back to my Amazon order and checked to see if there was a warranty - and there was, 5 years! I reached out to customer service via email with pictures of the keyboard and my original invoice. They responded within the same day and offered me a replacement!I have the replacement now and I still love it. The company has provided exceptional customer service - they were very responsive and they stand behind their product. They even checked in with me to make sure that I received the replacement and that it was working as expected.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bin überrascht was man für gute Qualität zum kleinen Preis bekommt
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Ich hatte mir schon die Maus von Klim gekauft und weil mich diese so überzeugt hatte, nun auch die Tastatur.Die Tastatur ist super schick, ich liebe das Pastellfarbend wirkende Licht des weißen Models und werde von allen beneidet.Auch das Tippen ist sehr angenehm. Die Leertaste quitscht bei mir etwas wenn ich sie nicht mittig drücke, aber das stöhrt mich bei dem Preis absolut nicht. Die Einrichtung war auch einfach, usb Stück eingestöpselt und los geht's. Bisher musste ich sie auch nicht aufladen. Absolut super Tastatur, gerne wieder.

I really love the keyboard, nice touch.Fun RGB colors, makes it cool to look at.Extra bonus the keyboard comes with a rechargeable battery,no more looking for batteries in the cupboard.Great for playing `Bards Tale 2` which requires lots of keyboard actions.
I like it. It looks cool on my workstation. Also, quality is good. Not sure about durability tho. Otherwise, great product!

Delivery was fantastic on time to a collection point near my place. Arrived in 2 days (Singapore). Also appreciate delivery updates via Telegram ninjabot. V prompt!The keyboard is brightly lit, keys are responsive. Works like a dream. Setup w usb was without a hitch as well. Packaging was good. Gee there were even nice stickers given. And a nice welcome note from the company. Looks like they take pride in their work! Awesome.Def a good buy. Don’t see why any should spend more money on big brand names.
